link.title: Mott Hall | Charter School - Morrisania Neighborhood - Bronx, NY

meta.name: description
meta.content: Mott Hall Charter School's education program is grounded in evidence-based research on how students learn best. We accept rising 6th graders eligible to enroll in New York City schools.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: school, charter school, Bronx, Morrisania, middle school, 6th grade, 7th grade, 8th grade, academics, donations, teaching approach, teaching, learning

b.span: The latest research in adolescent development and social emotional health
Integrating Literacy into lessons regardless of content area
Using Technology to accelerate student learning
Using data to inform instruction and improve student outcomes

div.div: The mission of the Mott Hall Charter School is to prepare our scholars in mind, body, and character to succeed in top high schools, colleges, and careers by becoming inquisitive, open-minded, and compassionate citizens of the world.
